main event: A sighting of a white sparkling object that resembled a star occurred while on duty, lasting approximately 5-10 minutes before it disappeared into the clouds.
interesting points: The object was described as having a diameter of 3-4 inches and exhibiting double exhaust or tail., The sighting was later verified as a balloon for an international flight., The object was observed to be moving in an upward direction., Witness only had brief visual confirmation before it disappeared., There were attempts to gather further information about the object's observation and possible weather-related explanations.
sighted object: white sparkling object resembling a star
witness description: A person on duty who observed the object.
